Conformance Criteria - Grade >1%: Invert 10mm or less from design (If pipe less than or equal to 1% grade, invert to be no more than 3mm from design levels)

Conformance Criteria - NDM testing will be undertaken at intervals of 1 in every 2km to correlate Clegg hammer target (CIV) to MDD
